import React from "react"; import '../styles/style.css'; // We import NavLink to utilize the react router. import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Sidebar() { function categoriesExpand() { } function categoriesCollapse() { document.getElementsByClassName('categories__collapse')[0].classList.remove('categories--hide'); document.getElementsByClassName('categories__collapse')[0].classList.add('categories--show'); document.getElementsByClassName('categories__expand')[0].classList.remove('categories--hide'); document.getElementsByClassName('categories__expand')[0].classList.add('categories--show'); } return (
  • inbox Inbox
  • today Today
  • calendar_month Upcoming
  • list Tasks
  • filter_list Filters

); }
